short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that reminds you to take care of your eyes periodically to reduce eye fatigue and stress.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are looking at the computer screen for long hours without breaks, you unknowingly introduce eye fatigue, which could lead to poorer eyesight. Shuteye is a free well-being tool to remind you to relax your eyes regularly using the 20-20-20 rule, and allows you even more configuration options according to your liking!

 üõéÔ∏è 2 configurable notification types - via a new tab, or a popup notification 
 9Ô∏è‚É£ A counter for how many times you have given your eyes some rest

It is a super easy to use chrome extension built with the intention of saving for people's eyesight!
